name: Squat King
description:
Mix and Game Jam Oct 2019 Submission

Jumping mechanic recreated in 3D from:
Jump King
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1061090/Jump_King/

Made by:
Tais Brogaard Pøhl
Alex Frier Stewart
Dennis Nhan Ly
Jonas Meilvang
Tanya Dørr Holst

Character Model and Animations From:
https://www.mixamo.com/

Music From:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b2ymevdZRRU
https://youtu.be/k9iYm9PEAHg?t=51

Controls:
WASD to move
Hold and release SPACE while holding a direction to jump
Esc to Exit
